Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to requiring additional training for real estate brokers and real estate salespeople to prevent discrimination in the real estate industry
Summary: Requires additional training for real estate brokers and real estate salespeople to prevent discrimination in the real estate industry.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to increasing required training for real estate brokers and real estate salespeople to prevent discrimination
